reporter_caption.center: LYONS v. SCHNEIDER, 30 Mass. App. Ct. 1103 (1991)

caption.center: THOMAS J. LYONS, individually and as administrator, vs. LOUISE T. SCHNEIDER.

opinion.opinion_text: The judgment of dismissal and the decision of the medical malpractice tribunal in favor of the defendant Schneider is vacated and that decision is replaced by a new finding and decision that the plaintiff's offer of proof as to the defendant Schneider is sufficient to raise a legitimate question of liability appropriate for judicial inquiry.
